name: mpc-rockwallet-backend
description: MPC Rockwallet monorepo: backend API and BSV SDK

scripts.build: npm run build -w @rockwallet/bsv-sdk && npm run build -w bsv-wallet-backend-service
scripts.test: npm run test -w @rockwallet/bsv-sdk && npm run test -w bsv-wallet-backend-service

author: Rockwallet Labs
